text: In the newly established LMDI method , the population effect ( ΔC p - effect ) , the affluence effect ( ΔC g - effect ) , the energy intensity effect ( ΔC e - effect ) , the economic structure effect ( ΔC s - effect ) , and the carbon intensity effect ( ΔC f - effect ) . In addition , social and economic factors such as urbanization ( ΔC UR - effect ) , family income in urban and rural households ( ΔC AI - effect ) were analyzed to further explain the changes of carbon emissions at the city level .
